Cornerstone

Cornerstone is an elegant SVN client designed specifically for the Mac. It is built on Subversion, a popular version control system well-known for its performance, flexibility, and scalability. Cornerstone excels in tracking & displaying changes to data; its comparison tools enable users to view differences in multi-language formats. Better yet, Planio is now integrated into the Cornerstone environment â€” so you can now easily sync a local folder with your Planio repositories using your Mac!

pviewsPrint the recursive view description for the key window.YESYES
